name: Soldier of Failure: Operation Zombie
description:
Soldier of Failure: Operation Zombie - this is the third part of 2D platformer with shooter elements. In this part you have to withstand a zombie Apocalypse. Kill zombies, collect ammo, avoid traps and then the game will not seem boring. The essence of this game is to collect ammunition, once you collect all the ammo on a level the door to your headquarters will open, passing through which you get to the next level. You have 5 lives, use them wisely, if you still die, don't worry, the level will restart again and you can try your hand against the fight against the zombie Apocalypse.


KEY FEATURES:

  • A large number of various levels.
  • Animated graphics.
  • Simple, interesting gameplay.
  • Unforgettable adventures.
